column3: If you run behave tests from PyCharm using behave 1.2.6-dev (installed from master branch), an error message is shown in console:

Behave ModelRunner class has been updated few months ago and now log_capture is located inside capture_controller. This commit contains the update: behave/behave@82aabc1#diff-6b74cab5955bbc0f7bce44cca7cfd975R435.
I close this PR because it's already solved in 9bd6f13
